mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(declUrl, '\d+')) as communitynum, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(declUrl, '\d+')) ORDER BY r.reg_date) AS rn FROM report r JOIN community p ON TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(r.declUrl, '\d+')) = p.communityNum ) WHERE rn = 1

SELECT communitynum FROM ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(declUrl, '\d+')) as communitynum, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(declUrl, '\d+')) ORDER BY r.reg_date) AS rn FROM report r JOIN community p ON TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(r.declUrl, '\d+')) = p.communityNum ) WHERE rn = 1
select communityNum, m.userName as postName,categoryNum,showNo, subject, reg_date as preg_date From community c join member1 m on m.userId = c.userId where communityNum = #{communityNum}

SELECT DISTINCT r.reasonNum, m.userid, r.reason, r.content, r.reg_date, m.userName as reportUser FROM report r JOIN member1 m ON r.memberIdx = m.memberIdx JOIN community p ON TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_SUBSTR(r.declUrl, '\d+')) = p.communitynum where communityNum = #{communityNum}
mapper.update: update community set showNo = #{showNo} where communityNum = #{communityNum}
